Class MyGenericException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • it.polito.nffg.neo4j.exceptions.MyGenericException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MyConstraintViolationException, MyNotFoundException

    public class MyGenericException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Root of the hierarchy for custom exceptions. By register a mapper for this exception, it will work for other ones also.
    See Also:
    Exception, Serialized Form
